taskDescription: Public policies and laws supporting ethics in marketing research have resulted in companies like Meta (formerly Facebook) being accused of intruding upon consumer privacy, misusing information gathered from users, and exploiting children. As a consumer, how do you feel about companies tracing your digital footprint? As a marketer, what value do you see in tracing consumersâ€™ online activities?
